price: Na wenye kumt'ii Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, na wakamwogopa Mwenyezi Mungu na wakamcha, basi hao ndio wenye kufuzu.
arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
footnotes: Na wenye kumt'ii Mwenyezi Mungu na kuridhia anayo yaamrisha Mtume s.a.w. na wakaiogopa dhati ya Mwenyezi Mungu Tukufu, na wakaukumbuka Utukufu wake, na wakaikhofu ghadhabu yake, hao ndio watakao pata radhi ya Mwenyezi Mungu na mapenzi yake, na neema za Pepo, na ndio wenye kupata kheri tupu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
